___FreeSize.description: The amount of currently available storage of this type (GB)

___TotalSize.description: The total amount of storage of this type (GB)

___Type.description: The type of storage capacity - StorageCapacity_t

___ReservedSize.description: The amount storage of this type which is not in use, but has been reserved for use in use (GB)

___StorageServiceID.description: The ID of the StorageService this capacity describes

___UsedSize.description: The amount storage of this type in use (GB)
